meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Terry O'Shea Tucker Pope Kevin Shen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6779.

td.p: Terry O'Shea, a sophomore at Princeton University from Bridgewater, New Jersey
Tucker Pope, a junior from Texas A&M University from Lubbock, Texas
Kevin Shen, a junior from the University of California, Berkeley from Cupertino, California

tr.td: COLD-BLOODED KILLERS
6-SYLLABLE WORDS
TEACHING "ASSISTANT"
FEMALE FANTASY CHARACTERS
IT TAKES 2
CELEBRITIES' MIDDLE NAMES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Research on this beast\'s vision led to a wet suit developed in Australia to look as unlike its usual prey as possible')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Research on this beast's vision led to a wet suit developed in Australia to look as unlike its usual prey as possible

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Alex: I loved it, Kevin. You just did one of these... [mutters and wiggles fingers as if counting] Does [*] have, uh, that many syllables?)
(Terry: Oh!)
(Alex: That\'s the word we were going for.)

veterinarian

Triple Stumper
')

JUST ONE VOWEL

SOCIAL LIFE
CARNIVAL KNOWLEDGE

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
